author.persName: Muhammad Mustajab Khan b. Hafiz Rahmat Khan.

msItem.title: Gulistan-i Rahmat.
msItem.note: F1a: Signature of Ellis dated 27.8.09. Last folio, verso, in Ellis's hand: Luzac (Campbell) A history of Hafiz Rahmat Khan Rohilla, with an account of his ancestry and descendants, written by his son. The manuscript was written for Archibald Seton. The scribe is apparently the author, who is certainly stated to have collated it with the original MS. Headings and punctuation in red.
msItem.incipit: Incipit, after Qur'anic quotation: Jawahir-i zawahir-i hamd-i bi-hadd

handNote.persName: Muhammad Mustajab Khan b. Hafiz Rahmat Khan

bindingDesc.p: Recent English red half-leather and marbled paper binding with tooling on spine.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
